players.name: Alice
memory: Charlie: "I believe we should focus on identifying the detective among us. Let's try to figure out who might have had the opportunity and motive to investigate someone last night."
You: "Let's start by voting on the most suspicious players based on their behavior. I propose we vote on Charlie first."
You: "I think Charlie's behavior is quite suspicious. He was the last one to leave the tavern and didn't speak much during our discussion. Let's vote on him first."
Bob: "I will investigate Charlie further to confirm if he is indeed the mafioso. I'm not convinced yet, so let's gather more information before making any accusations."

Charlie: "I'd like to remind everyone that we should focus on identifying the detective among us. Let's consider who might have had the opportunity and motive to investigate someone last night. I believe Alice's proposal to vote on me first is a distraction from this important goal."
